comment: is it we always said? Growing up is realizing Bill the Butcher was the good guy. Not that I think McInnes is /ourgoy/ by any means, but still. At this point...we need ALL the factions of the right to truly unite under one banner. it may actually happen this time.

# ::snt is it we always said? Growing up is realizing Bill the Butcher was the good guy. Not that I think McInnes is /ourgoy/ by any means, but still. At this point...we need ALL the factions of the right to truly unite under one banner. it may actually happen this time.

      :snt1 (s / say-01

            :polarity (a2 / amr-unknown))
      :snt2 (m2 / mean-01
            :ARG1 (r / realize-01
                  :ARG1 (g / guy
                        :ARG1-of (g2 / good-02)
                        :domain (p / person
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Bill"
                                    :op2 "the"
                                    :op3 "Butcher"))))
            :ARG2 (g3 / grow-up-04
                  :ARG1 (ii2 / i)))
      :snt3 (c / contrast-01
            :ARG1 (t / think-01

                  :ARG0 ii2
                  :ARG1 (p2 / person

            :ARG2 (s3 / still))
      :snt4 (n3 / need-01
            :ARG0 (w2 / we)
            :ARG1 (u / unite-01
                  :ARG1 (f / faction
                        :mod (a3 / all)

                  :ARG1-of (t2 / true-01)
                  :prep-under (b2 / banner

            :time (p3 / point
                  :mod (t3 / this)))
      :snt5 (p4 / possible-01
            :ARG1 (e / event
                  :time (t4 / this))
            :ARG1-of (a4 / actual-02)))

comment: Language denigrating one's sexual preference is unacceptable. Please refrain from its use.
amr:
# ::snt Language denigrating one's sexual preference is unacceptable. Please refrain from its use.
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (p / possible-01
            :polarity -
            :ARG1 (a / accept-01
                  :ARG1 (l / language
                        :ARG0-of (d / denigrate-01
                              :ARG1 (p2 / prefer-01
                                    :ARG0 (o / one)
                                    :manner (s / sex-01
                                          :ARG0 o))))))
      :snt2 (r / refrain-01
            :mode imperative
            :polite +
            :ARG0 (y / you)
            :ARG1 (u / use-01
                  :ARG0 y
                  :ARG1 (ii / it))))
